DataElement.preferredName: Prior Targeted Therapy Androgen Receptor Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to Androgen receptor target therapy as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Targeted Therapy Androgen Receptor Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._A type of cancer treatment that uses testing and medication to more precisely identify and treat cancer. These treatments target and disable genes or proteins necessary to the proliferation of cancer cells.:Androgen receptor (919 aa, ~99 kDa) is encoded by the human AR gene. This protein plays a role in the modulation of steroid-dependent gene transcription._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A type of treatment that uses drugs or other substances, such as monoclonal antibodies, to identify and attack specific cancer cells. Targeted therapy may have fewer side effects than other types of cancer treatments.

Concepts.definition: A type of cancer treatment that uses testing and medication to more precisely identify and treat cancer. These treatments target and disable genes or proteins necessary to the proliferation of cancer cells.

Property.preferredName: Androgen Receptor Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Androgen receptor (919 aa, ~99 kDa) is encoded by the human AR gene. This protein plays a role in the modulation of steroid-dependent gene transcription._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Androgen receptor (919 aa, ~99 kDa) is encoded by the human AR gene. This protein plays a role in the modulation of steroid-dependent gene transcription.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior AR-targeted therapy, except for AR-targeted therapy administered in the neoadjuvant and/or adjuvant setting and with disease recurrence more than 6 months since treatment completion?
